titleStmt.title: Unto His Majesties High Commissioner, and the Right Honourable Estates of Parliament. the petition of James Bayne His Majesties late Mr. Wright.
titleStmt.author: Bayne, James, master-wright.

notesStmt.note: Claiming payment for repair work carried out on Scottish castles and Holyrood Palace.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
